short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension panel assisting research & scholarship at WIU Libraries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WIU Libraries' Resource Management Services Unit has developed the Research Panel to 
increase library research productivity. The Chrome extension enables convenient 
access to library information resources and services including scholarly databases, 
library catalogs, ILLiad interlibrary loan services, and reference librarian chat.
